channel.title: Projects on Deepmalya
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Deepmalya

item.title: Financial Literacy among 18-35 year olds
item.description: In this academic project we have developed a model to judge the state of financial literacy of the general masses. We’ve collected the data from all over India, analyzed it with different statistical tools and deduced people’s financial literacy based on that. Here’s an overview on what to expect:

item.title: Deterministic Epidemic Modelling - HIV/AIDS
item.description: Associated with St. Xavier’s College (Autonomous), Kolkata As a part of my undergraduate dissertation, I decided to work on Epidemic Modelling focusing on HIV/AIDS with visualizations and its application to real-life scenarios. In this paper, we have discussed SIS, SIR, SEIR, and SIRS models and analyzed the key mechanics behind each model and how they correlate with real-world epidemics. We have also used the most direct approach to predict AIDS cases using HIV transmission dynamical models.
